name: Staff of the Elements
description: A mystical staff that channels the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is crafted from a rare wood and is adorned with intricate carvings representing the elemental forces. It has a crystal orb at the top that glows with a pulsating aura.

special_weapon_skills.Mystic Mastery: Increases damage done with mystical weapons.

special_effects.elemental_burst: Has a chance to release a burst of elemental energy upon successful hit, dealing additional damage to the target.

name: Enchanted Wand
description: A magical wand infused with enchantments.
looks: The wand has a slender, silver handle with intricate designs. At the top of the handle is a crystal that emits a soft, pulsating light.

special_effects.spellpower_boost: Increases the power of spells by 20%.

name: Mystic Staff
description: A mystical staff that channels the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of a polished wooden shaft with glowing symbols etched along its length. The top of the staff is adorned with a large gemstone that pulsates with magical energy.

special_weapon_skills.Mystic Mastery: Increases the damage of spells cast with the staff.

special_effects.elemental_attunement: Allows the wielder to tap into the elemental energy of their surroundings and temporarily enhance their spells.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The staff is made of polished rosewood and adorned with intricate silver runes. It emanates a soft, soothing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Heals the target with each successful hit

name: Staff of Healing
description: A mystical staff imbued with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of pure white wood and adorned with golden accents. It emanates a soft and soothing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing energy, capable of restoring health to its wielder.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft, adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. At the top of the staff is a crystal orb that emits a soft, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that restores nearby allies' health over time.

name: Sword of the Elements
description: A powerful sword empowered by the elements.
looks: The sword has a sleek design with a blade that shimmers with different elemental colors.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.elemental_fury: 20% chance to deal double damage with elemental attacks.

name: Bow of Poison
description: A bow that shoots arrows tipped with deadly poison.
looks: The bow is made of darkwood and is coated with a slick black poison. The string is made of spider silk.

special_effects.poison_damage: Arrows inflict poison damage over time.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is capable of healing wounds and curing ailments.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and has a crystal orb at the top. The orb glows with a soft green light, radiating healing energy.

special_effects.healing_touch: Staff grants a bonus to healing spells and increases overall healing power.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks
